page.title: 17LYNDSEY'S DAY
page.content: My alarm clock wakes me at 7.20a.m. When I rise I stroll through to the kitchen to eat a breakfast of cereal and milk.After breakfast,I dress in a white blouse,yellow,red and black tie, a grey skirt and grey "tank top".I make my way to the bathroom to wash my face and hands and to clean my teeth. I don my summer anorak and walk to school where I meet my friend.We are ble to chat for a few minutes before the bell summons us to our classrooms at 8.55a.m.The morning proceeds as James has described it.After lunch I play skipping,"tig"and"hide and seek"until I return to my class again at 1.30p.m.After school,I change into old trousers and sweater before working on any homework or piano practice.I have a light snack of biscuits,cheese and milk,before venturing out on my{"Roller-Boots".}
